name: Inside Jennifer - Season 1
description:
As you follow the life of Jennifer, she'll bump into many different characters and end up in lots of unexpected situations. You'll have to make decisions that will make certain routes available while closing the others. The choice is yours!
Content: 10.000+ IMAGES
200+ ANIMATIONSGameplay: Change Angles on Images
Nude Mode
Multiple choice and endings
And much more...Planned content and features for Inside Jennifer: Sound Effects for Animations
Trading Cards Steam Achievements
Inside Jennifer Season 1 is still in development.
Inside Jennifer Season 2 will be released and sold separately once it's complete.WARNING!This game features adult content and some content that some users might find offensive the game might include topics that some users might find offensive such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse.
